introduction: Full-stack developer with over 3 years of experience building scalable web applications using React, Node.js, and TypeScript. Experienced in collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality digital products. Passionate about leveraging technology to enhance user engagement and solve complex challenges.

workExperience.title: Front-End Developer
description: Technical Lead:Spearheaded the creation of a paperless trade platform, integrating React.js and Web3 APIs to ensure tamper-proof records, securing a 20M CNY grant from the Shenzhen Government.
Product Architect: Designed and implemented a 3D NFT platform from scratch using React and Golang, serving over 1,000 clients with a 96% satisfaction rate.
Legacy System Modernization: Migrated a legacy system to a Vue 3-based architecture, improving load times by 30% and enhancing stability.

AI Integration: Developed an intelligent Q&A chatbot leveraging the ChatGPT API, implemented real-time streaming to enhance user interactions, and scaled the system to support multiple departments, increasing overall productivity.

AWS Experience: Deployed containerized applications using AWS ECS and managed image repositories with AWS ECR, ensuring efficient deployment pipelines. Used AWS S3 for basic storage needs, such as handling static assets.

coursesAndInfo: Key Courses: Applied Investments, Data Analysis, Risk Management
Key Courses: Database basics, Mathematics and Algorithms, Financial Engineering

skills.title: Frontend
skills.value: React, Vue, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Cypress

skills.title: Backend
skills.value: Node.js, Next.js, PostgreSQL, RESTful & GraphQL APIs

skills.title: DevOps
skills.value: AWS (Lambda, ECR, ECS), Docker, CI/CD (GitHub Actions)

projects.title: Cloud IDE
description: Worked with a cross-functional team to design and implement scalable full-stack applications using Node.js and React.
Enhanced functionality by integrating preset plugins for intelligent code completion, folding, and debugging.
Automated deployment pipelines on AWS using CI/CD (GitHub Actions) and Docker, enabling seamless scalability.

projects.title: Asset-Backed Tokenization Platform
description: Designed and implemented a blockchain platform enabling financial asset digitization and trading in secondary markets.
Built front-end interfaces with Vue.js and TypeScript, integrating blockchain data via Web3.js.
Customized React Native wallets to facilitate blockchain interactions, and developed smart contracts to enable asset tokenization.

projects.title: Cross-Border Paperless Trade Platform
description: Developed a blockchain-based platform for digitizing cross-border trade documents, ensuring tamper-proof records and transparency.
Designed a renderer using React for seamless user interaction and integrated with Web3.js for blockchain operations.
Integrated Tradetrust and OpenAttestation libraries and utilized smart contract calls to enable secure wrapping, signing, and verification processes.
